commit message:
MyAccount and AccountSettings refactored. Got rid of some compiler
warnings.

First implementation of the Account sync - task 29: cannot turn sync on
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/29
Fixed Service was not started. Ignoring repeating alarm

Communication with MyService redesigned and implemented initially for
syncing accounts.
Got rid of IPC and MyService interfaces' definitions.
Fixed hang due to excessive synchronization

Fixed command error was not detected.
Fixed account created not synced automatically by default.
Fixed credentials were not saved for the new account

New preference added: Notification of 'Commands in the queue' - task 23:
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/23
Creation of new identi.ca accounts disabled

Turn sync on for accounts, created in previous version (this doesn't
work...)

Please enable Sync in Settings for your old accounts after installing
this version of the application!
